build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libpq-dev && docker-php-ext-install pdo pdo_pgsql && curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_20.x | bash - && apt-get install -y nodejs && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev && npm install && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan config:cache && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8080
